dialogues.text: Blake emerges from the passenger side... Carter tosses he walkie-talkie...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't be a stranger...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carter pulls away from the school...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blake hooks the walkie-talkie to her side, heads back int the campus, passes --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: hidden behind the bushes, Eddie's rotting corpse locked inside...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lots of nubile young bodies moving to and fro, changing o of sweaty gym clothes into dry attire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON Molly, standing in front of a fogged-up mirror, straig from the shower... towel tucked firmly around her chest. Linda stands to her right, putting on her make-up... also a towel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shane's going as a condom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought you were allergic to latex.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll pop a Benadryl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think they'll let him in dressed like that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, they're so stupid... I'll just tell them he's going as a sausage casing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda swipes her palm across the fogged-up mirror, wiping away the steam...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON the MIRROR.  In its reflection we see Molly and Linda. then --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: appears from the cloud of steam behind them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Other STUDENTS spot the intruder, run SCREAMING from the locker room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SHAPE grabs Linda from behind... wields a knife... sl her throat... blood cascades down her neck, 'blemishes th towel around her bust.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON Molly, immobile.  Terrified.  Unable to scream.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: lifeless body drops to the floor... eyes wide open in ter

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: shifts his attention to

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: gets her legs back, runs like hell... runs smack into

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: at the locker room entrance... grabs Molly in her arms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa.  What's going on in there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Molly is on the verge of hysterics --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda!  He killed Linda!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Michael Meyers!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri darts into the locker room...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing) Miss Tate, wait!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Molly follows her, stands in the relative safety of the doorway... Keri walks in to find --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: standing above Linda's lifeless body... knife raised high the air, dripping blood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON Keri, her legs buckle... she struggles to stay standin

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Michael, nooooooo!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then, an even more bizarre sight --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: starts to CHUCKLE... his shoulders bobbing up and down... bending over slightly at the waist.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: lifeless body starts trembling with laughter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: reaches up to his mask, pulls it off... it's JOHN!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was classic... (imitating Keri) "Michael, nooooooo!"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: sits up, licks some blood off her fingers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mmmm.  Anyone got some French fries?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John and Linda cracks up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON Keri, mortified... the sight of her son dressed like h homicidal uncle is almost too much for her to bear...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John and Linda are too busy revealing in their prank to notice...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing) Molly, you should have seen your face...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri crosses over to John... SLAPS him across the face, h John reels, probably the first time Keri's laid a hand on him...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Home... NOW!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri grabs John by the arm, pushes him past Molly...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John sits on the sofa.  Will stands behind him... neither sure exactly what they're doing there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri paces in front of them...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, alright?  It was just a stupid joke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will, sit down...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will does.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing) There's something I have to tell you both.  It's going to sound strange...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My name hasn't always been Keri Tate.  It was once Laurie Strode.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're right.  It does sound strange.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You some kind of fugitive or something?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was trying to get away from someone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Michael Meyers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The serial killer?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's my brother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now you're joking, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Afraid not.  You can pick your friends, but you can't pick your family.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri, have you been...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will mimes taking a drink from a bottle...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, Will, this isn't the alcohol talking.  It's the truth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't believe this is happening.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit happens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait a minute... slow down... you're telling me Michael Meyers is my uncle?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Any other psychotic relatives I should know about?  Jason?  Freddy Krueger?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why didn't you tell me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was trying to protect you from this...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri holds up this trademark Halloween mask, a tuft of ha tightly in her grip...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John crosses to the front door, opens it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing) Where are you going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John exits.  Keri starts after him, Will grabs her by the arm...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You just dropped a shitload on him... give him some time to digest it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you going to leave, too?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Never.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri nuzzles her head against Will's chest...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing) So you're really Michael Meyers' sister?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do we have to invite him to the wedding?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri laughs, more out of relief than anything...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A couple of Ferndale P.D. SQUAD CARS flank either side of road.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: lined up across the asphalt deny access to the roadway leading to Hillcrest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON Carter, leaning against a squad car.  Deputy Clark sta next to him.  Carter lights up a cigarette...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry, Detective.  No one's getting up to that school.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And this is the only way up to Hillcrest?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure is.  Unless your boy can fly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hope not.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deputy Clark laughs, Carter doesn't... just takes another drag off his cigarette...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Darkness falls... Halloween night.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: make their way inside the gymnasium.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Freshman, armed with cartons of eggs and rolls of toilet paper, emerge stealthily from the wooded acreage... they attack the Hillcrest Administrative Building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The school custodian heads for the bell tower... spots th young punks across campus defacing what he works so hard preserve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He takes off in their direction.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (calling off) Hey, you kids!  Knock that off! Get over here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boys see Wally headed in their direction... they scramble, head back for the woods... a few of them throw in Wally's direction.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wally makes it about halfway across campus before his old ticker kicks in... he has to stop... catches his breath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing) Damn kids.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wally turns around, heads back to the bell tower.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One by one the freshman disappear into the thicket... one the boys runs smack into...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boys stares up at him, startled... he darts after his friends... the SHAPE continues toward Hillcrest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Molly sits on the windowpane, her forehead pressed agains the glass.  Lurch, the dog, lies across her bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A view of the entire campus.  Couples make their way acro the grounds, move inside the gymnasium. Molly lets out a sigh, wishes that were her and John... s continues to stare longingly out the window...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON Wally as he moves to the bell tower, disappears inside He is followed by...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON Molly.  She sits up, takes notice... watches as the SH moves inside the bell tower, then suddenly...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: grabs Molly by the shoulders... spins her around, reveali

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: in full "Bride of Frankenstein" costume.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BLAAAAAGGGHHHHH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit, Linda!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're so easy...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wasn't scaring the hell out of me once today enough?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nope.  Hey, you think I'll win scariest costume?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda, you are without a doubt the scariest person on campus.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Shane?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Condom Boy is waiting for me in the cafeteria.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But the dance is in the gymnasium.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Very insightful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Echoes across the campus.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing) Let the party begin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have enough fun for the both of us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, don't be such a victim.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda produces a couple of shot bottles from her purse, tosses them on the bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing) Here.  Drink a couple of these. It'll putcha in a much better mood.  Ta-ta.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda exits.  The bell continues to ring.  Molly sits on bed, pats Lurch on the head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guess it's just you and me, boy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The bell stops ringing abruptly.  Molly turns her attenti back to the window...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At the top of the bell tower... the SHAPE stands beside t massive bell... staring in Molly's direction, looking rig through her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Molly gasps softly.  She looks down below and sees...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: leave the dormitory, heads for the cafeteria.  Molly look back up to the bell tower... the SHAPE has vanished.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just some idiot in a costume...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Molly sits back on her bed, uses Lurch as a pillow... Mol picks up one of the shot bottles, twists off the lid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing) Let the party begin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Molly takes a swig from the bottle.  She shudders, her so expression says it all...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dark and abandoned.  THE CAMERA PANS across a bevy of emp tables and chairs to reveal...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: liplocked, hands all over each other.  Linda sits on the of a table.

dialogues.text: Shane, dressed as a condom, stands between her legs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: watches from the kitchen, illuminated only by the light f a nearby soda machine.

dialogues.text: Shane pushes Linda down onto the table, starts to unbutto her blouse...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have to pee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can't you hold it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can't you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda pushes Shane off her, heads for the restroom.  She passes the kitchen area... the SHAPE is nowhere in sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda enters the bathroom...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda crosses to a shall, tugs on the door... it's locked She knocks on the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Somebody in there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No answer.  She pulls at it again... still doesn't budge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing) Hellooooo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She kneels down on the ground, peers under the door.  Not

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She stands back up... shrugs it off... moves to the next stall and goes inside, closing the door behind her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Linda takes care of "business."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (singing) IF YOU THINK I'M SEXY. AND YOU WANT MY BODY. COME ON, BABY.  LET ME KNOW.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The toilet flushes.  Linda emerges from the stall, crosse the mirror... checks her make-up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda admires her reflection... not noticing the stall do which was previously locked is now opened.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She smiles at herself, licks her teeth, then exits to the hallway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda emerges from the bathroom... she heads toward the center of the room...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Empty.  No sign of Shane anywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (calling off) Shane?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda moves into the kitchen area where...

dialogues.text: emerges from the shadows, attacks Linda... grabs her by t throat, lifts her into the air... Her head hits the pot rack hanging above her... pots and drop to the tile floor below...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda flails her arms and legs, desperately trying to fre herself form the SHAPE'S grasp...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She kicks the refrigerator door behind her... it swings o to reveal...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Asphyxiated, his condom hat pulled down over his head... corpse topples out of her refrigerator, falls onto the floor...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: flicks the switch on a nearby MEAT SLICER, it WHIRS to li

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shape forces Linda's head against the slicer... she struggles furiously as her cheek approaches the spinning blade...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: everywhere as Linda is carved into quarter-inch slices...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VARIOUS SHOTS of the empty campus, all the students now congregated inside the gymnasium.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pulsating beat of faint dance MUSIC drifts across the grounds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The festival is in full swing... jam packed with costumed couples dancing across the floor.  CHAPERONES line the wa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: leans against the refreshment table, sans costume.  Arms folded... there in body, mind elsewhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: approaches her, dressed as Count Dracula.  He offers Keri glass of punch...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (as Dracula) May I offer you some fresh blood? I squeezed it myself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri glances at him, not amused...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not a real fan of Halloween humor, Will.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (realizing) Oh, right.  Sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm gonna head back to the office... finish up some things.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can't it wait till Monday?  I thought maybe we could dance... (as Dracula) I'm very light of my feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri manages a sincere smile, gives him a kiss...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks, but I'm not much in the mood for dancing.  Enjoy the party... you did a great job.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri heads for the exit, Will watches her leave...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: on the bedside table, next to two other shot bottles... untouched.  CAMERA PANS to the bed where...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: lies, fully clothed... facing the ceiling.  Eyes wide ope thinking of the night that could have been...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON Lurch, lying on the floor beside the bed... he sits up his eyes focused on...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Its door slightly ajar...  the lights on inside.  Somethi inside catches Lurch's attention... he GROWLS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatcha growling at, huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Light seeps out from the cracks in the open door, illumin the sleeves of several hanging blouses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lurch, there's nothing in there but clothes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Molly gets up... moves to the closet, open it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wall-to-wall clothes hang from wooden dowels... Molly pal the lightswitch, flicks off the light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Molly closes the door, tight... heads to the bathroom dow the hall, Lurch follows her out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The misfits who tee-pee'd the school have returned, this with black duffel bags in tow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: of the gymnasium... one of the FRESHMEN pulls a thick thr foot long CHAIN from his duffel bag... wraps it around th door handles... he produces a PADLOCK, hooks it through t loops of the chain... snaps it shut, locked tight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another freshman sneaks into the gymnasium, while a fello SCHOOLMATE hide behind some bushes... on the lookout for Wally.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Molly returns from the bathroom, passes... THE CLOSET DOOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's ajar once again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Molly climbs into bed, turns on her side... she reaches o to the side of the bed... pets the dog.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guess there's always next year... if I live past the humiliation of tonight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At that very moment, Molly sees...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The dog enters the room, sits in the doorway... growls in direction.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON Molly.  Shit!  She instantly stops petting whatever is under the bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: full of confusion, flushes with fear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Terrified, she slowly leans over the edge of the bed... c eye-to-eye with --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beneath her bed, staring right at her... she was petting hair on his mask all along.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Molly SCREAMS.  The SHAPE grabs her arm, drags her off th bed onto the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Molly struggles with him, as he tries to climb on top of

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SHAPE maintains a strong grip on her ankle with one h swings a knife fiercely at her with the other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He makes contact, slices open her left thigh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Molly SCREAMS in agony, kicks her legs wildly... she mana to strike a hard blow to his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She breaks free of his grip, takes off limping down the hall... her hand pressed against the gaping wound carved her thigh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seems to stretch for miles... Molly limps down the corridor, dragging her leg behind he she looks behind her... no sign for the SHAPE... yet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She ducks into one of the room, hides behind the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: emerges from her room... heads down the hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON Molly trying desperately not to breathe, she watches a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: passes by... she lets out a silent sigh of relief, when suddenly...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: steps back into the doorway, looks into the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Molly freezes, looks at the wall beside her, she sees...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: projected on the wall, it betrays her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (squealing) Oh, God...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SHAPE reaches through the crack in the hinged side of door... grabs Molly by the hair, reels her in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Molly grabs the door... pulls it towards her, smashing th SHAPE'S arm between the door and the jam.  He releases he

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She flies out of the room, down the hall... stumbles down flight of stairs... dashes out of the dormitory.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The party is in full swing.  Students and teachers alike crowd the gym floor, dancing to the music blaring from th loudspeakers above.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hung above a large red button.  THE CAMERA PULLS BACK TO REVEAL the freshman, who snuck in earlier, poised beneath it... He punches the button, then pops it off and puts it in hi pocket... he darts for the front entrance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The gymnasium floor begins to move beneath the students' feet, splits right down the middle... retracts into the walls...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The students part like the Red Sea, hooting and hollering the pool beneath them is revealed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The freshman flies out of the gym, slams the doors shut behind him... his schoolmate chains the doors, locks them with a padlock.  They dart for the woods, passing...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: stumbles towards them, her pants bloodied.  She SCREAMS, tries to get their attention... they disappear into the thicket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She moves to the rear of the gymnasium, bangs on the chai doors... SCREAMS for help, looks over her shoulder to see

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: headed straight for her.  She hobbles to the front entran bangs on the door...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me in!  Oh, God, help me! Somebody... goddamnit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SHAPE closes in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Molly's screams are lost amongst the gleeful SQUEALS of t party goers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The floor continues to glide open beneath their feet, revealing...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: floating, face down in the pool... water tainted bright r with her blood, illuminated by the pool light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The mood suddenly changes... the SCREAMS of excitement quickly turn into SHRIEKS of horror.  Bedlam ensues... Frightened students scramble toward the entrance, knockin party goers into the pool... trampling over others.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Students stack up against the doors, pounding furiously.. trying to get out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: tries to calm the petrified party-goers...

dialogues.text: Keri sits behind her desk, Detective Blake's BUSINESS CAR hand...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She jiggles the receiver... STILL NOTHING.  She is distra by --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: from outside her office.  Keri crosses to the window...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Molly standing at the gymnasium entrance, pounding agains the door with bloody palms... screaming bloody murder, tr desperately to get in, while the students on the other si try in vain to get out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Molly?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SHAPE approaches her, now only a few feet away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Molly tugs feverishly at the chains, they hold tight.  Sh bolts for the bell tower, trailing blood... the SHAPE fol

dialogues.text: ON Keri, horrified... he's back.  She charges out of the office, on a mission...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Molly bursts through the door... she stops at the bottom the staircase, looks up to see...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: spiraling high above her.  She hobbles up the stairway, grunting in agony...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As she makes her ascent, she looks down to see...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: three flights down, begins its climb up the stairs.  Moll picks up the pace...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: to swing... BUT there is no sound!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Molly frantically pulls the rope again, SCREAMING madly.. trying desperately to get someone's attention...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Still no sound!  She moves to the gargantuan bell, looks inside and sees...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: stuffed up inside of it, preventing the clapper from stri the bell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RING-RING-RING!  THE BELL RESONATES ACROSS CAMPUS.  A cal for help...

dialogues.text: Molly continues to pull at the rope, her wrists bleeding the cord digs into her skin.  She watches in horror as...

dialogues.text: approaches the top of the stairway... a FIGURE emerges, it's...

dialogues.text: Molly SCREAMS... the SHAPE grabs he... wraps the ROPE tig around her neck... Molly grasp for breath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Running furiously across the campus... trying desperately reach the bell tower in time...

dialogues.text: ON THE GYMNASIUM DOORS, the weight of the wooden bench po the chains wrapped around the handles, the doors fly open

dialogues.text: watches as crazed STUDENTS pour out of the gymnasium, hea for the parked buses across campus...

dialogues.text: (realizing) John...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: leads the charge of getting all students safely aboard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: manages to find John amongst the throng...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mother and son reunite...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He found you, didn't he?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get on the bus.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Molly?  She's not in her room...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just get on the bus.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not leaving without her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John, you can't help her now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?  Where is she?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri's at a loss for words, it's written all over her fac

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, God... no... not Molly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please, get on the bus...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John hesitates for a beat... climbs into the bus, takes a window seat...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: crosses to Keri, hugs her tight...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri, you all right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got to get these kids out of here...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll make sure there's no kids left in the dorms...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: dashes toward the dorms...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: climbs aboard the bus, stands next to the driver... waits impatiently for Will to return.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The BUSES are on the move... leaving the academy single file...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watching from inside his bus as it prepares to leave...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Waves to John through the window, knows this may be the l time she ever sees him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She turns to the driver --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You go ahead.  Will and I will follow you in my car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The DRIVER nods in agreement...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri gets off the bus, watches as the last bus drives thr the open gates of the academy...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri crosses to the dorms, disappears inside --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri moves noiselessly down the hallway... searching for sign of Will... holding her breath with every door she ch behind...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (a loud whisper) Will... Will, where are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri rounds a corner, spots --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: seeping through the cracks of a swinging door leading to dorm's kitchenette.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: crosses to the swinging door, slowly pushes it open to reveal --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: his whole upper torso shoved into the oven, clothes ablaz

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: runs into the kitchen, yanks Will out of the oven by his

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON WILL.  Hair singed-off his head, his face a mangled ma of burning flesh, mouth agape in horror...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, God, Will...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri kneels down beside him, helpless... filled with rage

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The kitchen door swings violently to and fro... Keri spin around, startled by --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The dog jumps on her chest, licks her face gleefully.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get off me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The dog's mood changes suddenly: he stops licking Keri an GROWLS ferociously at something behind her...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri slowly turns around to see --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: standing above her, comes down on her with a knife... mak contact, slices her shoulder wide open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: scrambles to her feet, grabs a pot off the stove... swing the SHAPE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Delivers a hard blow to the SHAPE'S head with the iron po The SHAPE stumbles backward, Keri sprints out the door...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri comes running from the building, dashes across campu and into --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri bursts through the door, runs down the hallway into

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her body sprawled across Keri's bed, THROAT SLIT from ear ear... a TOMBSTONE in lieu of a headboard, "LAURIE STRODE carved into stone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You son of a bitch!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The fury wells inside of her.  Keri crosses to the bed, d to her knees... pulls out the metal box underneath the mattress... opens it... IT'S EMPTY!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing) Shit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri runs from the house, determined... makes her way acr campus to --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri crosses to the console, pushes the BUTTON that contr the gate... it begins to close slowly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hattie's body falls from the drop-ceiling above, lands ri on top of Keri.  Shit.  Keri throws the bloody corpse off her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks around the room... zeroes in on the large CB RADIO... she picks it up and SMASHES it against the console... over and over again... sparks fly... the gate permanently closed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri reaches down, pulls Hattie's key ring from her body. moves outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri moves to the gate... locks it using Hattie's keys, t tosses them over the gate into the brush.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (calling off) Time to put an end to this nightmare, motherfucker!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri heads back toward the school.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deputy Clark lies on the hood of his patrol car, hat over face... catching some z's.  Carter stands by the wooden barriers, spots --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: speeding toward the roadblock, headed for the small town below...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deputy Clark is awakened by the approaching caravan.  Car waves down a bus, moves to the door --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing) What's happening?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're evacuating the school. Been two murders up there tonight. Killer's still on the loose...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goddamnit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carter runs back to the patrol car, followed by Deputy Cl

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (calling off) Call for back-up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A flurry of action as OFFICERS clear the roadblocks, get the radio and call for back-up...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carter and Deputy Clark climb into the patrol car, headed the school...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carter grabs his walkie-talkie, barks into it --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blake, what's going on up there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: still hooked to the side of her lifeless body...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blake! Do you hear me?  Blake!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VARIOUS SHOTS of the empty campus.  Keri moves brazenly across school grounds, looking for the big brother....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As she passes the bell tower, she sees --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: move inside the gymnasium... she quickly approaches --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri moves inside the decorated gym... stops at a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: hanging behind glass... she picks up a plastic skull, sma the glass with it... grabs the AXE and continues inside..

dialogues.speaker: CLICK
dialogues.text: The lights go out... the gym now eerily illuminated only carved pumpkins lit around its perimeter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri continues on, bravely... the fire axe tightly in her grip.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (calling off) Let's ends this right now.  You want to kill me to fulfill your twisted obsession, then go ahead. I'm tired of playing hide-and- seek, brother.  Come on, finish what you started, you miserable fuck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri jumps... the gymnasium floor beneath her begins to m closing back over the pool...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri continues to move alongside the pool, when --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: jumps from the bleachers, buries a knife deep into Keri's arm... she SCREAMS in pain... drops the fire axe into the pool.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shape pulls the knife from Keri's arm, stands above her... he raises the knife high into the air, about to pl it straight into Keri's heart, when --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spins him around, comes face-to-face with...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: standing behind him, wielding Keri's SMITH AND WESSON.  T SHAPE moves toward him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JOHN empties the chamber into the Shape, thrust him backward...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: falls into the pool, pulls Keri into the water with him..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: struggles to climb out of the pool, the Shape fights to p her back in....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: finds the axe, swings at Keri... slice open her thigh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: grabs Keri by the arms, manages to pull her out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: strives to climb out of the water as the gym floor contin to close... he swings the axe, buries the blade into the floor... grabs the handle, uses it to pull himself out...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: grabs a JAVELIN hanging on the wall...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: pulls his upper torso out of the water just as

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: raises the javelin high into the air, when --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reaches out for her... then, a sound altogether unnatural

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (a desperate plea) Laurie...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Time stands still -- TOTAL SILENCE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON KERI.  All the love and loss of the past twenty years plays all over her face, when --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Michael... (then) Go to hell!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: plunges the javelin through his body with all her might, pierces his heart... the javelin juts out of his back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: arches his back in pain, grabs the metal rod... tries desperately to remove it, sinks into the water...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: closes above him... CLANG!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Half the javelin sticks out above the floor... it twitche fiercely, then stops...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: storms the gym, gun drawn... followed by Deputy Clark and dozen armed police officers.  He approaches Keri...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guess he was stoppable, after all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri and John embrace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: POLICE CARS litter the campus.  The corpse of THE SHAPE l covered on a gurney... a pair of PARAMEDICS roll it past

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: parked near the entrance, its rear doors open revealing -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: being tended to by a PARAMEDIC.  Keri sits next to him...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just can't believe she's dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri does the only thing a mother can do, gives him a hug

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I love you, John.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Always the guy, John just shrugs, giving her a tough smil

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, me too, Keri.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Call me Laurie, will ya?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keri.... Laurie... how about if I just call you Mom?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That would work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two embrace an another PARAMEDIC closes the rear door the ambulance, locking Keri and John safely inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mother and son continue to bond as the ambulance drives o into the night.
